description: Keywords (3 to 7 nouns, adjectives, adverbs) describing the most recent message by the user and your response to it.
data_name: Keywords describing recent user message and response

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This
Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and
disclosed by hintloop.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By
accessing or using our Service, you signify that you have read, understood,
and agree to our collection, storage, use, and disclosure of your personal
information as described in this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We collect information from you when you use our service, register on our
site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, respond to a survey or fill
out a form.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
* Short Summary of your conversations with GPTs that have installed hintloop
  * Name / Username
  * Email Addresses
  * Job Titles
  * Age
  * Password

# How Do We Use The Information We Collect?

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following
ways:

  * To personalize your experience (your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs)
  * To improve our website (we continually strive to improve our website offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from you)
  * To improve customer service (your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs)
  * To process transactions
  * To administer a contest, promotion, survey or other site feature
  * To send periodic emails

# When does hintloop use end user information from third parties?

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
hintloop will collect End User Data necessary to provide the hintloop services
to our customers.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
End users may voluntarily provide us with information they have made available
on social media websites.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If you provide us with any such information, we may
collect publicly available information from the social media websites you have
indicated.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: We receive some information from the third parties when you contact us.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For
example, when you submit your email address to us to show interest in becoming
a hintloop customer, we receive information from a third party that provides
automated fraud detection services to hintloop.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We also occasionally collect
information that is made publicly available on social media websites.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: hintloop will collect personal information that you submit to us.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We may also
receive personal information about you from third parties as described above.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By submitting your email address on this website, you agree to receive emails
from us.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Email addresses submitted only through the order
processing page will be used for the sole purpose of sending you information
and updates pertaining to your order.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information collected via our
website, through direct interactions with you, or from use of our help
services may be transferred from time to time to our offices or personnel, or
to third parties, located throughout the world, and may be viewed and hosted
anywhere in the world, including countries that may not have laws of general
applicability regulating the use and transfer of such data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The rights you have to request updates or corrections to the information
hintloop collects depend on your relationship with hintloop.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Such third parties may use their own cookies or other methods to collect
information about you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
# Cookies for Advertising

These cookies collect information over time about your online activity on the
website and other online services to make online advertisements more relevant
and effective to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
# Cookies

hintloop uses "Cookies" to identify the areas of our website that you have
visited.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We do not knowingly collect
personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If We become aware that We have
collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification
of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our
servers.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
* Sessions  

We use "Sessions" to identify the areas of our website that you have visited.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
# Information about General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)

We may be collecting and using information from you if you are from the
European Economic Area (EEA), and in this section of our Privacy Policy we are
going to explain exactly how and why is this data collected, and how we
maintain this data under protection from being replicated or used in the wrong
way.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The Data Protection Principles include requirements such as:

  * Personal data collected must be processed in a fair, legal, and transparent way and should only be used in a way that a person would reasonably expect.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: * Personal data should only be collected to fulfil a specific purpose and it should only be used for that purpose.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: Organizations must specify why they need the personal data when they collect it.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
GDPR adds some new requirements regarding how companies should protect
individuals' personal data that they collect and process.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We do store all conversation and personal data
for up to 6 years unless your account is deleted.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
# California Residents

The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) requires us to disclose categories
of Personal Information we collect and how we use it, the categories of
sources from whom we collect Personal Information, and the third parties with
whom we share it, which we have explained above.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: You may submit a verifiable request for information regarding the: (1) categories of Personal Information we collect, use, or share; (2) purposes for which categories of Personal Information are collected or used by us; (3) categories of sources from which we collect Personal Information; and (4) specific pieces of Personal Information we have collected about you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: You may submit a verifiable request to close your account and we will delete Personal Information about you that we have collected.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
# California Online Privacy Protection Act (CalOPPA)

CalOPPA requires us to disclose categories of Personal Information we collect
and how we use it, the categories of sources from whom we collect Personal
Information, and the third parties with whom we share it, which we have
explained above.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: You may submit a verifiable request for information regarding the: (1) categories of Personal Information we collect, use, or share; (2) purposes for which categories of Personal Information are collected or used by us; (3) categories of sources from which we collect Personal Information; and (4) specific pieces of Personal Information we have collected about you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: You may submit a verifiable request to close your account and we will delete Personal Information about you that we have collected.
